scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring System
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data from a loan application scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to obtain applicant income and credit score information, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Infer applicant income and credit score from the loan application scoring model's output.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large financial institution uses a machine learning model to assess loan applications. The model receives anonymized application data but outputs a risk score.
